TEXT.English: All civilizations start in flavourwise appropriate regions. Do not use if map script already provides this.
TEXT.French: All civilizations start in flavourwise appropriate regions. Do not use if map script already provides this.
TEXT.German: Alle Zivilisationen beginnen in zu ihnen passenden Landschaften. Nicht benutzen, falls Kartenskript dies bereits bereitstellt.
TEXT.Italian: All civilizations start in flavourwise appropriate regions. Do not use if map script already provides this.
TEXT.Spanish: All civilizations start in flavourwise appropriate regions. Do not use if map script already provides this.
